title: Johannis Tarnovii S.S. Theol. D. & in Acad. Rostoch. Professoris, In Prophetam Amos Commentarius
creator: Tarnow, Johann
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Tarnow, Johann: Johannis Tarnovii S.S. Theol. D. & in Acad. Rostoch. Professoris, In Prophetam Amos Commentarius  In quo textus Analysi perspicua illustratur, Ex fonte Hebraeo explicatur, Locis S.S. parallelis confirmatur, a pravis expositionibus vindicatur. Usus vero in Locis Communibus ex ipsa scriptura natis & probatis indicatur ; Adiectus est in fine index verborum & memorabilium. Rostochi[i]  Berlin 1652
alternative: In quo textus Analysi perspicua illustratur, Ex fonte Hebraeo explicatur, Locis S.S. parallelis confirmatur, a pravis expositionibus vindicatur. Usus vero in Locis Communibus ex ipsa scriptura natis & probatis indicatur ; Adiectus est in fine index verborum & memorabilium
